short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens the Salesforce developer console from your currently opened Org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to open the Salesforce developer console with one click. This aims to simplify your workflow to make opening the dev console a 1 click process!
